name: Music_3549.wav
keywords: ['didgeridoo music', 'droning sound', 'bass sounds', 'no percussion', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'tribal instrument']
caption: This sound is produced on a didgeridoo. The song has a droning sound interspersed with sounds of bass notes. There is a rhythm to this droning and bass sound but there is no melody. This song has a tribal feel. This song can be played in a movie scene where a person is lost in a forest.
